alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:02PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Weakening thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Weld County through 530 PM MDT... At 500 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking decaying thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Carpenter to 4 miles northeast of Rockport, or along a line extending from 43 miles west of Kimball to 12 miles south of Cheyenne. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grover and Hereford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Northeast Weld County
